mapper.select: SELECT MJ.MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS JOIN_DATE, (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_NAME, (SELECT MEMBER_BIRTH FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_BIRTH, LEADER_YN, GROUP_NO, (SELECT (MEMBER_IMG_PATH||MEMBER_IMG_RENAME) FROM "MEMBER_IMG" WHERE MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_IMG FROM "MEMBER_JOIN" MJ WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND JOIN_STATUS = 0 ORDER BY LEADER_YN DESC, MEMBER_NAME

SELECT MEMBER_NO, (SELECT (MEMBER_IMG_PATH||MEMBER_IMG_RENAME) MEMBER_IMG FROM "MEMBER_IMG" WHERE MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_IMG, (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_NAME, LEADER_YN,TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, ' YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" ') AS JOIN_DATE, (SELECT MEMBER_BIRTH FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = MJ.MEMBER_NO) MEMBER_BIRTH FROM "MEMBER_JOIN" MJ WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
